mapper.select: select a.* from el_course_account a inner join el_course b on a.course_id = b.id left outer join el_document c on a.id = c.course_doc_id where b.type_id = #{typeId} and a.to_date = convert(varchar(10), getdate() + convert(int, #{day} + (dbo.fn_GetTotalHolidays(getdate() + #{day}, getdate())*-1)), 121) and c.id is null

select a.* from el_course_account a inner join el_course b on a.course_id = b.id where b.type_id = #{typeId} and a.to_date = convert(varchar(10), getdate() + convert(int, #{day}), 121) and a.course_status = 'process'

select a.* from el_course_account a inner join el_course b on a.course_id = b.id where b.type_id = 'BC0101' and DATEDIFF(dd, a.to_date, convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 121)) = #{day} and a.course_status != 'complete'
